metadata.Title: CVE-2021-41498 on Ubuntu 18.04 LTS (bionic) - medium.
metadata.Description: Buffer overflow in ajaxsoundstudio.com Pyo &lt and 1.03 in the Server_jack_init function. which allows attackers to conduct Denial of Service attacks by arbitrary constructing a overlong server name.

criterions.comment: python-pyo: while related to the CVE in some way, a decision has been made to ignore this issue (note: 'end of standard support, was needs-triage').
